setGoogleTransactionId(java.lang.String).Description: Sets Google's unique identifier for this transaction. This field is required and must be identical to the value returned in an earlier @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#FullWallet_E@ in the same transaction.

setDetailedReason(java.lang.String).Description: Sets any additional information about why the @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#ProxyCard_E@ transaction failed. This field should only be set with a corresponding @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#NotifyTransactionStatusRequest#Status#Error_E@ status.

setStatus(int).Description: Sets the status received from processing the @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#ProxyCard_E@ in a @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#FullWallet_E@ response. This field is required and must be one of the values in @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#NotifyTransactionStatusRequest#Status_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#wallet#NotifyTransactionStatusRequest#Status#Error_E@.
